comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 10 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body: After testing for a while, I can only draw the conclusion that `mshortener.com` itself is a malware site, because it seems to willingly let itself redirect to malware sites, instead of using popups or scripts.

labels.description: Problematic issues, handled in List-KR

issue.body:
# 나무위키의 파워링크 및 기타 광고 차단을 위한 지침

최근 나무위키에서 지속적인 파워링크 필터 대응에 따라 많은 광고 차단기 필터들이 재대응을 목표로 하고 있습니다.
빠른 대응 속도에 광고 차단기의 필터 업데이트 속도가 따라가지 못해 현재 많은 수의 오차단이 발생하고 있습니다.

즉, 저희가 필터를 업데이트하여도 실제로 여러분의 광고 차단기는 업데이트를 제때 받지 못할 수도 있다는 문제점이 있습니다.

더욱 효과적인 차단을 위해 아래 사항을 권고드립니다.

## 광고 차단기의 설정을 업데이트하여 필터 업데이트 속도 개선

<details>
AdGuard나 여타 광고 차단기에서의 빠른 필터 업데이트를 위해 기존 필터 목록에서 List-KR을 제외하고 사용자 지정 필터 목록에 List-KR을 신뢰된 필터로 추가하세요.

### Windows, Android 및 웹 브라우저 확장 프로그램 (Safari 제외)

- https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues/236#issue-1168415899

### iOS 및 macOS의 AdGuard for Safari

아래 글을 참고하여 추가로 필터 패치가 필요합니다.

- https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues/236#issuecomment-1084964861
</details>

## 광고가 차단되지 않았을 때 / 잘못 차단되었을 때

<details>
나무위키의 차단은 현재 IP 대역 및 기타 환경에 따라 다르게 보일 수 있다고 추정하고 있습니다.
광고가 정상적으로 차단되지 않은 경우에는 **로그인 여부** 및 **사용하시는 통신사** 등의 환경을 추가로 댓글에 기입해주시면 더 나은 대응이 가능합니다.
또 차단되지 않은 페이지의 DOM 구조 또한 파악이 필요한데 사용하시는 웹 브라우저에서 우클릭 후 웹 사이트 저장을 통해 추가 정보를 업로드해주시면 감사하겠습니다.

개인정보가 포함된 경우 Thunderbird 등의 메일 암호화 서비스를 통하여 아래의 지원 이메일 주소 중 하나로 암호화된 메일을 전송해주십시오.

- https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues/223

> 그 외 타 광고 차단 필터를 사용하면 DOM 구조가 정상적으로 표지되지 않을 수 있으니 광고 차단기를 끄고 저장해주세요.
</details>

## 성능 문제의 발생

<details>
저희는 현재 이미 경우에 따라 성능 문제가 발생할 수 있음을 인지하고 있습니다.
성능 문제는 광고 차단기의 나무위키의 DOM을 검사하는 과정에서 패턴을 인식하는데에 과도한 리소스가 사용되어 발생하는 것입니다.
이는 장기적인 목표로 해결되어야 하지만 단기적으로 빠른 차단을 위해 발생할 수 있습니다.
성능 문제로 인해 불편을 감수하시는 경우 현재 레포지토리의 최근 커밋 목록을 참조하여 필터 규칙을 따로 비활성화할 수 있도록 하십시오.

규칙을 비활성화하려면 `namu.wiki#@#`로 시작하는 규칙을 사용자 규칙에 추가하면 됩니다.

### 직접 광고를 차단하기

이 때에는 직접 광고를 차단하실 수 있도록 사용하시는 광고 차단기에서 **직접 웹 사이트의 요소 차단** 기능을 이용하시는 것이 권장됩니다.

> 단, 현재 방식으로 생성된 규칙을 저장소에 전송하지 마세요. 나무위키의 구조는 무작위로 변경되는 특성이 있어 다른 사람에게 적용되지 않거나 너무 많이 업데이트해야 할 수도 있습니다.
</details>

_Originally posted by @seia-soto in https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues/236#issuecomment-1086910452_

issue.body:
Включите расширение AdGuard Extra в настройках программы.

---

Пользователям браузерного расширения нужно установить скрипт `AdGuard Extra`. Для этого понадобится браузерное расширение-скриптоприёмник `Tampermonkey`

Ссылка на `AdGuard Extra`
https://userscripts.adtidy.org/beta/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js

После установки скрипта нужно будет зайти в настройки `Tampermonkey`, включить режим эксперта, переключить режим встраивания на `мгновенный` и перезапустить расширение:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641343-07248e00-b94c-11e9-9775-9854a7922889.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641299-f7a54500-b94b-11e9-8a83-885d89abbeec.png)

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 10 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [http://mal.ru](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fmal.ru) ### Comment > Пользуюсь приложением почты mail. ru и раньше всю рекламу благополучно блокировал adgusrd. Но последние дни, в приложении в верху постоянно висит реклама, и никак её нельзя заблокировать. На скриншоте приложение в работе, верхний левый угол показывает "щит" - блокировщик активный. ### Screenshots

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 10 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
Включите расширение AdGuard Extra в настройках программы.

---

Пользователям браузерного расширения нужно установить скрипт `AdGuard Extra`. Для этого понадобится браузерное расширение-скриптоприёмник `Tampermonkey`

Ссылка на `AdGuard Extra`
https://userscripts.adtidy.org/beta/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js

После установки скрипта нужно будет зайти в настройки `Tampermonkey`, включить режим эксперта, переключить режим встраивания на `мгновенный` и перезапустить расширение:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641343-07248e00-b94c-11e9-9775-9854a7922889.png)

issue.body:
Включите расширение AdGuard Extra в настройках программы.

---

Пользователям браузерного расширения нужно установить скрипт `AdGuard Extra`. Для этого понадобится браузерное расширение-скриптоприёмник `Tampermonkey`

Ссылка на `AdGuard Extra`
https://userscripts.adtidy.org/beta/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js

После установки скрипта нужно будет зайти в настройки `Tampermonkey`, включить режим эксперта, переключить режим встраивания на `мгновенный` и перезапустить расширение:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641343-07248e00-b94c-11e9-9775-9854a7922889.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641299-f7a54500-b94b-11e9-8a83-885d89abbeec.png)

issue.title: yandex.ru

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
### ВНИМАНИЕ

Пользователям программы для `Windows`, `macOS` или `Android` нужно включить расширение `AdGuard Extra` в настройках программы.

---

Пользователям браузерного расширения нужно установить [расширение AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra#how-to-install-adguard-extra) либо скрипт `AdGuard Extra`(этот вариант может не везде срабатыавать). 

<details><summary>Установка скрипта  "AdGuard Extra" в расширение "Tampermonkey"  :</summary>

Для установки скрипта понадобится браузерное расширение-скриптоприёмник `Tampermonkey`

Ссылка на `AdGuard Extra`
https://userscripts.adtidy.org/beta/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js

После установки скрипта нужно будет зайти в настройки `Tampermonkey`, включить режим эксперта, переключить режим встраивания на `мгновенный` и перезапустить расширение:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641343-07248e00-b94c-11e9-9775-9854a7922889.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641299-f7a54500-b94b-11e9-8a83-885d89abbeec.png)

</details>

issue.title: thwiki.cc
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://thwiki.cc/%E9%A6%96%E9%A1%B5](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fthwiki.cc%2F%25E9%25A6%2596%25E9%25A1%25B5) ### Comment Username: @whuihuan > 我是网站方的管理者，我需要为这一块内容解释一下。 > 这一块内容是网站的宣传轮播，因为本网站为东方project的社群维基，内容均与东方project相关。该轮播的作用是宣传东方相关的创作、引导购买正版东方project官方作品（如截图上的《东方文果真报》就是东方project官方发售的刊物）、网站公告（例如东方project作者ZUN的生日）、THBWiki附属项目（例如幻想乡柱状地图网页版、东方版人格测试、东方音乐索引站）等作用，并非是与站点内容无关的收益化广告。adguard错误的将其屏蔽会导致一些刚认识东方project的用户失去了解一些东方最新相关的内容，并且会对网站的布局产生影响（例如空了一大块），希望adguard团队能正确判断用户提交的广告举报，避免因为错误的举报导致网站正常功能使用收到影响。 ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/BUIUFCJ.jpg)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/2876rVl.jpg)
Screenshot 3 ![Screenshot 3](https://reports-img.adguard.com/SHpOZzT.jpg)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser extension v4.0.173 Browser: | EdgeChromium Stealth mode: | disabled Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base

Other:
Filter unblocking search ads and self-promotion

Language-specific:
AdGuard Chinese

comment.body: This is a wrong ad rules. The blocked element is the website's announcement carousel, which is used for announcements of website-related items. The advertisements reported by reporters are actually promotions of projects within the site, not for-profit advertisements unrelated to the site.

Все включено

On Tue, May 31, 2022 at 1:40 AM jellizaveta ***@***.***>
wrote:

> @Arihska145 <https://github.com/Arihska145>
> Пожалуйста проверьте включены ли у вас блокировщики контента в Safari.
> Для этого нужно зайти в настройки вашего устройства, затем перейти в
> настройки Safari, после нажать на вкладку "Правила блокировки
> контента"/"Extensions". И включить все блокировщики контента AdGuard, если
> они выключены.
>

- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension, AdGuard for Safari, AdGuard for Windows

### AdGuard version

AdGuard Browser Extension 4.0.171, AdGuard for Safari 1.11.4

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox, Chrome, Microsoft Edge

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

yandex.ru or google.com

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, Filter unblocking search ads and self-promotion

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

Send Do-Not-Track header

### Add your comment and screenshots

- Enable self promotion filter
- Go to google/yandex
- Search for anything (ex. "buy shoes")

There should be self-promotion advertising
### Actual: 
It's blocked

pull_request.title: Fix #120380 migros.com.tr
pull_request.body:
### Prerequisites

#### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [ ] This is not an ad/bug report;
- [x] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [x] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [x] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

### What problem does the pull request fix?

#### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [ ] Missed ads or ad leftovers;
- [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [x] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc;
- [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [x] Filters maintenance.

### What issue is being fixed?

Closes #120380

### Add your comment and screenshots

#### If possible, a screenshot of a page or application should not be cropped too much. Otherwise, it is not always clear where the element is located

0. **DO NOT** upload screenshots with sexually explicit material on GitHub directly.\
 Instead, upload it to a third-party image hosting and post the link to it without preview (!) here.\
 Also, mention if the link leads to NSFW content;

1. Add screenshots of the problem. You can drag and drop images or paste them from clipboard

    Use `<details> </details>` tag to hide screenshots under the spoiler;

2. Describe the issue in detail until it is absolutely clear from the screenshot what the problem is

    You can also indicate any other information that you think the developers should know.

**Warning:** Please remove personal information before uploading screenshots!

1. Your comment

<!-- Please write a comment here -->

2. Screenshots

<details>

<summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

<details>

<summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

### Terms

- [ ] By submitting this issue, I agree that pull request does not contain private info and all conditions are met

comment.body:
Для Яндекс браузера лучше использовать программу вместе с нашим скриптом (включается в настройках - расширения) - расширениям блокируется доступ к их сервисам. Также можно использовать другой браузер (Chrome / Firefox) и установить скрипт вместе с расширением.

---

Пользователям браузерного расширения нужно установить скрипт `AdGuard Extra`. Для этого понадобится браузерное расширение-скриптоприёмник `Tampermonkey`

Ссылка на `AdGuard Extra`
https://userscripts.adtidy.org/beta/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js

После установки скрипта нужно будет зайти в настройки `Tampermonkey`, включить режим эксперта, переключить режим встраивания на `мгновенный` и перезапустить расширение:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641343-07248e00-b94c-11e9-9775-9854a7922889.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641299-f7a54500-b94b-11e9-8a83-885d89abbeec.png)

issue.title: Shazam can't search when traffic control is enabled in Adguard

labels.name: A: Cannot reproduce
labels.description: Filters devs cannot reproduce this issue

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

3.6.8

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

the problem is with app, not a site

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

Shazam app

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard Russian filter, AdGuard Spanish/Portuguese filter, AdGuard Turkish filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter, AdGuard DNS filter, EasyPrivacy, Online Malicious URL Blocklist

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

Hi,

I have found this unusual behaviour which is observed on my old Android 8 phone.
See attached picture below.

When traffic control is enabled in Adguard, Shazam assumes it is offline and can't search for tracks.
But as soon as I disable traffic control, Shazam immediately can access it database to identify a track.

I've been using both apps on this phone for a number of years with no issues. Why is this happening now?

Thanks.

https://i120.fastpic.org/big/2022/0525/22/92b5b72299b4f2ccfe35e492a3e85f22.jpg

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
You can exclude the app temporarily.

@zloyden @AdamWr please check on older Android. Probably some requests are made different than in latest Android.

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

3.6.8

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

the problem is with app, not a site

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

Shazam app

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard Russian filter, AdGuard Spanish/Portuguese filter, AdGuard Turkish filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter, AdGuard DNS filter, EasyPrivacy, Online Malicious URL Blocklist

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

Hi,

I have found this unusual behaviour which is observed on my old Android 8 phone.
See attached picture below.

When traffic control is enabled in Adguard, Shazam assumes it is offline and can't search for tracks.
But as soon as I disable traffic control, Shazam immediately can access it database to identify a track.

I've been using both apps on this phone for a number of years with no issues. Why is this happening now?

Thanks.

https://i120.fastpic.org/big/2022/0525/22/92b5b72299b4f2ccfe35e492a3e85f22.jpg

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body: Thank you. Android did not show up as target when I hit the transfer button

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 10 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

review.body: I missed in the previous review but if Annoyance is enabled all those iframes are empty. You can change `||bipblog.com/bipblog.html` I requested to `||bipblog.com^$subdocument,~third-party` and also add `bipblog.com##iframe[src^="http://bipblog.com/"]` in Annoyances > widget. Sorry for extra work.

I missed in the previous review but if Annoyance is enabled all those iframes are empty. You can change `||bipblog.com/bipblog.html` I requested previously to `||bipblog.com^$subdocument,~third-party` and also add `bipblog.com##iframe[src^="http://bipblog.com/"]` in Annoyances > widget. Sorry for extra work.

issue.title: yt5s.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://yt5s.com/en91](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fyt5s.com%2Fen91) ### Comment > I have used YT5s.com for quite some time and never had a problem with it. But today that white box in the center appeared. On checking the code I discovered that even on mouse-over it and on every other possible interaction with the box, it send info (don't know what type, though --not that savvy) to "eehuzaih.com". Here's another image showing the page code and the "event" https://i.ibb.co/JB61J96/eehuzaih-com-2.png > Of course I searched for it online and sure enough it's reported by several sites as a virus-like form of adware. For instance, see here: https://mypc.guru/remove-eehuzaih-com-hijacker/ but neither my antivirus nor Adguard caught it. Perhaps it's brand new. ### Screenshots

issue.title: megaup.net detects adblock
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension

### AdGuard version

4.0.171

### What type of problem have you encountered?

AdGuard gets detected on a website

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

megaup.net

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Chinese filter, AdGuard French filter, AdGuard German filter, AdGuard Japanese filter, AdGuard Russian filter, AdGuard Turkish filter, EasyList Italy, Liste AR, Frellwit's Swedish Filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

Hide your search queries, Send Do-Not-Track header, Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests, Self-destruction of third-party cookies, Hide your Referrer from third-parties (specify in comment below, if used custom value)

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 10 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

AdGuard gets detected on a website

megaup.net
